arts.ttl: St. Pauli take down Hoffenheim and win 1-0 thanks to Baumann's mistake
arts.sum: A HUGE result for St. Pauli in their fight against relegation: the club from Hamburg wins at home against Hoffenheim, thanks to a rare mistake from Oliver Baumann.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli edge past Hoffenheim to earn relegation boost
arts.sum: St. Pauli secured a 1-0 victory over TSG Hoffenheim in a relegation six-pointer, with Noah Weißhaupt's goal proving the difference at the Millerntor-Stadion on Friday evening. The Millerntor-Stadion played host to a crucial relegation battle as St. Pauli welcomed Hoffenheim on Matchday 26 of the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: St. Pauli vs. Hoffenheim
arts.sum: The lineups for the Friday night clash between St. Pauli and Hoffenheim have been announced. How ist the Bundesliga matchday 26 going to kick off?

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Hoffenheim preview: Hosts out to end winless run
arts.sum: St. Pauli will look to end a six-game winless run when they welcome Hoffenheim to Millerntor-Stadion for Friday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim midfielder Samassekou a doubt for rest of season
arts.sum: Another injury blow for Christian Ilzer and the Sinsheimers to deal with.

arts.ttl: Alexander Blessin discusses options for reviving St. Pauli’s fledgling attack
arts.sum: FC St. Pauli trainer Alexander Blessing addressed his team's fledgling attack at a Thursday press conference.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim confirm major injury for Diadie Samassekou, Ilzer speaks on Bazoumana Touré’s potential
arts.sum: Injuries were largely the topic of conversation at TSG 1899 Hoffenheim trainer Christian Ilzer's Thursday press conference.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
